remarks: Nobleland Arts N Learning Place provides children aged 18 months to 6 years old engaging and joyful learning experiences through an Award Winning Arts Integrated Curriculum and programme(Visual Arts, Dance Education, English Literature and Drama, Chinese Theatre, Kindermusic) to broaden children's perspectives and to empower them to make better connection in learning. We also actively collaborate with parents and various communities like Science Centre Singapore and National Arts Council to provide the most resourceful and creative platform for each child to excel.
